text: Indochina or the Indochinese Peninsula or the Mainland Southeast Asia is a region in Southeast Asia. The region lies roughly east of India, south of China. Indochina comprises the territory of the following countries: * Cambodia * Laos * Vietnam Those countries have been known as Indochina since they were French Indochina. Often also included in the scope of the term are: * Peninsular Malaysia (comprising the southern end of the Malay Peninsula but not the Malay Islands) * Myanmar (formerly known as Burma) * Singapore * Thailand (formerly Siam) == References == == Other websites == Category:Southeast Asia Category:Peninsulas of Asia
title: Indochina
